Description: BLS - Percent change in wages over the prior two quarters
formula: Lookup by county and 2 digit NAICS
Explain: Change in wages in region

Description: BLS - Normalized slope of the number of establishements over prior 4 quarters
formula: Lookup by county and 2 digit NAICS
Explain: Change in establishments in region

Description: BLS - Absolute value of normalized slope of weekly wages over past 2 quarters
formula: Lookup by county and 2 digit NAICS
Explain: Change in weekly wages in region

Description: BLS - Normalized slope of the number of workers per establishment over the prior 4 quarters
formula: Lookup by county and 2 digit NAICS
Explain: Change in workers per establishment in region

Description: Bureau stat - Exposure frequency Relativity
formula: Lookup by state and governing class
Explain: Exposure Frequency for the governing class

Description: Bureau stat - Percentage of loss time claims
formula: Lookup by state and governing class
Explain: Portion of loss time claims for the governing class

Description: Bureau stat - Indemnity severity (credibility smoothed)
formula: Lookup by state and governing class
Explain: Indemnity Severity for the governing class

Description: Bureau stat - Indemnity severity Relativity
formula: Lookup by state and governing class
Explain: Indemnity Severity for the governing class

Description: Bureau stat - Medical severity (credibility smoothed)
formula: Lookup by state and governing class
Explain: Medical Severity for the governing class

Description: Bureau stat - Premium frequency (with calculated impute for missing values)
formula: Lookup with impute: COALESCE(bs_gc_prem_freq, impute_bs_gc_prem_freq)
Explain: Premium Frequency for the governing class

Description: Bureau stat - Premium frequency of indemnity claims
formula: Lookup by state and governing class
Explain: Indemnity Frequency for the governing class

Description: Bureau stat - Indemnity premium frequency Relativity (credibility smoothed, capped and floored)
formula: Lookup by state and governing class
Explain: Indemnity Frequency for the governing class
Short Name: Gov Class indemnity premium frequency relativity

Description: Historical 3 year premium freq (credibility smoothed, with actual claim count if greater than the credibility adjusted value) relative to Bureau stat average for the gov class
formula: (GREATEST(GREATEST(calc_claim_count_cred_3yr, 0.05*GREATEST(loss_years_3, 1)), claim_count_non_zero_upto_3)/NULLIF((premium_modified_rating_pure_initial*loss_years_3), 0))/NULLIF(BS_GC_PREM_FREQ_WIMP, 0)
Explain: Historical Frequency for submission relative to average for the governing class

Description: Historical 3 year premium freq (credibility smoothed) relative to Bureau stat average for the gov class
formula: (GREATEST(calc_claim_count_cred_3yr, 0.05*GREATEST(loss_years_3, 1))/NULLIF((premium_modified_rating_pure_initial*loss_years_3), 0))/NULLIF(BS_GC_PREM_FREQ_WIMP, 0)
Explain: Historical Frequency for submission relative to average for the governing class

Description: Historical premium per claim (up to 3 years)
formula: (cc.premium_modified_rating_pure_initial*c.loss_years_3)/NULLIF(c.claim_count_non_zero_upto_3, 0)
Explain: Historical Premium Per Claim for submission

Description: Premium per excess portion of claims
formula: (cc.premium_modified_rating_pure_initial*c.loss_years_3)/NULLIF(cc.calc_claim_count_cred_3yr*inverse_d_ratio, 0)
Explain: Historical  Premium Per Claim for submission by govering class d-ratio

Description: Premium per claim by severity
formula: c.bs_gc_severity_wimp/NULLIF((cc.premium_modified_rating_pure_initial*c.loss_years_3)/NULLIF(cc.calc_claim_count_cred_3yr*inverse_d_ratio, 0), 0)
Explain: Historical Frequnecy for submission by average Severity for the governing class
Short Name: Submission frequency by Gov Class severity

Description: Count of classes
formula: Count payroll > 0
Explain: Number of positive dollar classes
Number of $0 classes

Description: E-mod
formula: Policy input
Explain: Experience Mod

Description: Numeric hazard group of the governing class
formula: Class attribute
Explain: Governing Hazard Group

Description: Indicates if any classes on the policy are driver classes
formula: Class attribute
Explain: Presence of drivers

Description: Quoting modified rating pure premium
formula: (Payroll/100) * loss cost * e-mod
Explain: Premium amount
